abstract: Google may soon become the primary source of e-books on the Web sites of hundreds of independent booksellers.
snippet: Google may soon become the primary source of e-books on the Web sites of hundreds of independent booksellers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Independent bookstores were battered first by discount chains like Barnes & Noble, then by superefficient Web retailers like Amazon.com.

headline.main: Stores See Google as Ally in E-Book Market
headline.print_headline: Stores See Google as Ally in E-Book Market

abstract: A venture capital firm just gave that value, and it is more than triple the worth of the social networking company a year ago.
snippet: A venture capital firm just gave that value, and it is more than triple the worth of the social networking company a year ago.
lead_paragraph: Facebook has latched on to some good friends. Elevation Partners, a venture capital firm, just gave the social networking company a valuation of $23 billion in its latest secondary market purchase of 2.4 million shares. That’s more than triple what Facebook appeared to be worth a year ago. And at nearly 30 times trailing sales, it’s about twice the multiple Google achieved when it went public in 2004.

abstract: Is Facebook really worth the $23 billion valuation it has received from Elevation Partners’ secondary market purchase of 2.4 million shares?
snippet: Is Facebook really worth the $23 billion valuation it has received from Elevation Partners’ secondary market purchase of 2.4 million shares?
lead_paragraph: Facebook has latched on to some good friends. Elevation Partners, a private equity firm, just gave the social networking company a valuation of $23 billion in its latest secondary market purchase of 2.4 million shares.

abstract: Apple continues to push the boundaries of its Kindle book software announcing Wednesday that it will soon offer in-browser book samples.
snippet: Apple continues to push the boundaries of its Kindle book software announcing Wednesday that it will soon offer in-browser book samples.
lead_paragraph: It has been a busy week for Amazon’s Kindle division: On Monday the company announced that it would start selling new e-books that come embedded with audio and video. On Tuesday, Amazon also released a free Kindle application available for download on Google Android phones.

headline.main: Amazon to Introduce Web-Based Book Previews

abstract: Google says that China is blocking some searches from its users in mainland China.
snippet: Google says that China is blocking some searches from its users in mainland China.
lead_paragraph: Ever since tensions erupted between Google and the Chinese government earlier this year, Beijing has made sure the search engine was on unsteady ground, unpredictably blocking and then unblocking search results and other Google services within the country.

abstract: On this week’s podcast: Miguel Helft on Google’s victory over Viacom, family-friendly online multiplayer gaming and a look at new headphones.
snippet: On this week’s podcast: Miguel Helft on Google’s victory over Viacom, family-friendly online multiplayer gaming and a look at new headphones.
lead_paragraph: In this week’s New York Tech Talk podcast, Bettina Edelstein speaks with Miguel Helft, who has followed Viacom’s lawsuit against Google over  copyright infringement of YouTube videos.

headline.main: Tech Talk Podcast: Videos and Video Games
